item.title: RTC Bus Accident in Gadwal Leaves 20 Injured, Four Critical
item.description:
<![CDATA[Description: A major RTC bus accident on NH-44 in Jogulamba Gadwal left 20 passengers injured after the bus overturned. Four people are reported critical, and police have launched an investigation into the cause.
Jogulamba Gadwal: RTC Bus Overturns on NH-44
A serious RTC bus accident on NH-44 in Jogulamba Gadwal district left 20 passengers injured after the vehicle lost control and overturned on the highway. The incident occurred in the early hours near Itikyala Padu stage of Undavalli mandal,...]]>
item.author: Mohammed Yousuf, Senior Content Editor, Hyderabad, Telangana Affairs Mohammed Yousuf Is A Senior Content Editor At Munsif News, Covering Hyderabad, Telangana Affairs.With Over A Decade Of Experience In Journalism, Yousuf Reports On Governance, Public Issues, Law, Order
